name: 人類發展
goals: 探討個人由出生至老年的發展變化
認識人類發展心理學的理論及研究方法
學習人類發展各領域發展的內涵
認識人類發展的重要影響因素
建立正確的自我信念與生命價值觀
syllabus:
1：Basic concepts, methods, and theories of development

2：Prenatal development and birth

3：Physical, sensory, and perceptual development in infancy

4：Cognitive, social and personality development in infancy

5：Physical and cognitive development in early childhood

6：(10/11放假)

7：Social and personality development in early childhood

8：Physical and cognitive development in middle childhood

9：期中考試

10：Social and personality development in middle childhood

11：Physical and cognitive, development in adolescence

12：Social and personality development in adolescence

13：Development in early adulthood

14：Development in middle adulthood

15：Development in late adulthood and the end of life

16：期末考試

17：彈性學習週

18：彈性學習週

methodologies.note: 安排學生小組討論並於課堂分享討論的結果
使用投影片及搭配影片等補充教材融入教學

grading.note: 學期中會指定二份作業，作業格式與主題配合課程進度另行公布。
每週課堂會依當週主題安排學生進行小組討論並於課堂分享討論的結果，參與討論的程度將作為評分參考。
